Music

  • When I was a bass at Chaverim <3
  • I-spend-too-much-time-on-YouTube Playlist
  • Some of my favorites:
    • J.S.Bach
      • Chaconne in BWV 1004: Raphaella Smits, Ivry Gitlis
      • Cello Suites
        • No.1: Mischa Maisky
        • No.5: Hidemi Suzuki
        • No.6: Beiliang Zhu, Kazuhito Yamashita
      • Jazz concert: Richard Galliano
    • Astor Piazzolla
      • Libertango: Pablo Ziegler, Ju Yeon Chae & Kevin Loh
      • Histoire du Tango
        • Full piece: Sami Junnonen & Petri Kumela
        • Café 1930: Angela Longo & Angelo Martines, Marisa Gómez & Javier Albarés
        • Night club 1960: Kian Soltani & Petrit Ceku, Gallardo & Cortabarría
      • Adiós Nonino: André Rieu, Carlos Buono & orch
      • Four Seasons of Buenos Aires
    • Agustín Pío Barrios
      • La Catedral: Ana Vidovic
      • Una Limosna por el Amor de Dios: David Russell
      • Un Sueño en la Floresta: Kyuhee Park
    • 梁祝(The Butterfly Lovers): Ji-Won Song & Beilin Han, Xuefei Yang
    • 渔舟唱晚(Fisherman’s Song at Eventide): Xuefei Yang
    • Carlo Domeniconi, Koyunbaba: Pirai Vaca
    • Chopin, Ballade No. 1 in G minor, Op. 23: Krystian Zimerman
    • Handel - Halvorsen, Passacaglia: Hauser & Lana Trotovsek
    • Dvořák, “New World” Symphony
    • Holst, The Planets
